00629 
00630 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00631 // For compatibility, the interface of some functions taking a std::string was
00632 // changed to const char* to avoid crashes between binary incompatible STL
00633 // versions. This code her is inlined,  so it shouldn't cause any problems.
00634 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00635 
00636 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00637 AI_FORCE_INLINE const aiScene* Importer::ReadFile( const std::string& pFile,unsigned int pFlags){
00638     return ReadFile(pFile.c_str(),pFlags);
00639 }
00640 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00641 AI_FORCE_INLINE void Importer::GetExtensionList(std::string& szOut) const   {
00642     aiString s;
00643     GetExtensionList(s);
00644     szOut = s.data;
00645 }
00646 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00647 AI_FORCE_INLINE bool Importer::IsExtensionSupported(const std::string& szExtension) const   {
00648     return IsExtensionSupported(szExtension.c_str());
00649 }
